definition[0]: a very low male singing voice, or a man with a voice like this
definition[1]: the part of a musical work that is written for a singer with a bass voice
definition[2]: the lower half of the whole range of musical notes
example[0]: The band features Johnson on bass (=playing the bass guitar).
definition[5]: a bass instrument or voice produces low notes
definition[6]: a fish that can be eaten and lives in both rivers and the sea
